marklogic.body: We hired fools as civil servants! How won't men of this age and calibre know that in any efficient system no fraud goes undetected? The two legs of the account must Always balance. These thieves capitalized on the imperfection of the system to have gotten this far. They were oblivious of this doomsday. They must Cough out the last kobo. CHIKENAN! It belies imagination that the IGBOMINAS recently honored Thief Tafa Balogun, AN ILLUSTRUOUS THIEVING SON, WHO RETURNED HOME TO LICK THE UNDESERVED JUICE OF FRAUD!
